ecosystem.subtitle: A comprehensive suite of intelligent solutions powering the future of business

industries.cta_subtitle: Join the revolution. Let's build the future of your sector together with AI-powered solutions.

ecommerce.description: VortexPay delivers instant vendor payouts and multi-currency transfers, while VortexComply automates merchant onboarding and compliance.
ecommerce.name: E-commerce & Marketplaces

value_props.0: Instant vendor disbursements, multi-currency payments, and automated compliance
value_props.1: Smart matching of buyers/sellers, dynamic pricing, and procurement optimization
value_props.2: Business intelligence for inventory, sales, and risk management
value_props.3: Seamless marketplace integration with full API support

education.description: Digital transformation for school management, payments, and compliance with easy onboarding solutions for institutions and students.
education.name: Education

value_props.0: Digital transformation for school management, payments, and compliance
value_props.1: Easy onboarding and payment solutions for institutions and students
value_props.3: Secure student data management and financial tracking

financial_services.description: Power your bank or fintech with VortexCore AI. Instantly onboard clients, automate KYC/KYB/AML, and enable secure cross-border paymentsâ€”all within a modular, API-driven ecosystem.
financial_services.name: Financial Services & Fintech

value_props.0: Seamless, compliant, and intelligent infrastructure for payments, compliance, and risk management
value_props.1: Embedded finance and cross-border B2B payments
value_props.2: AI-driven compliance (KYC, KYB, AML), fraud detection, and dynamic risk profiling
value_props.3: Banking-as-a-Service APIs and RegTech for banks and fintechs

logistics.description: Real-time payments, vendor verification, and compliance for logistics providers with fleet management integration.
logistics.name: Logistics & Transportation

value_props.0: Real-time payments, vendor verification, and compliance for logistics providers
value_props.1: Fleet management integration and secure cross-border settlements
value_props.2: Supply chain optimization with AI-driven insights

public_sector.description: Digital compliance, payments, and financial inclusion tools for government and NGOs with secure, scalable infrastructure.
public_sector.name: Public Sector & NGOs

value_props.0: Digital compliance, payments, and financial inclusion tools for government and NGOs
value_props.1: Secure, scalable infrastructure for public sector innovation and empowerment
value_props.2: Transparent fund management and impact tracking
value_props.3: Citizen services digitization with AI-powered efficiency

real_estate.description: Secure payment rails, compliance automation, and business intelligence for property transactions with trusted onboarding.
real_estate.hero: Real Estate Reimagined: Secure, Smart, Seamless
real_estate.name: Real Estate

value_props.0: Secure payment rails, compliance automation, and business intelligence for property transactions
value_props.1: Trusted onboarding and risk management for real estate professionals
value_props.2: Automated property verification and due diligence

smes.description: Meet BizGenieâ€”your AI-powered business co-pilot. Track cash flow, get inventory alerts, and receive smart recommendations to scale.
smes.hero: Empowering SMEs: Your Growth, Our Genius
smes.name: SMEs & Business Services

value_props.0: All-in-one platform for vendor verification, payments, working capital, and business intelligence
value_props.1: Embedded AI assistant (BizGenie) for cash flow, inventory, and actionable insights
value_props.2: Tiered onboarding for financial inclusion and growth
value_props.3: Automated compliance and risk management for small businesses

story_section.subtitle: From launching pioneering AI platforms to empowering enterprises across Africa, our journey is rooted in innovation and trust.
story_section.title: Our Story

0.description: VortexCore AI has transformed our approach to compliance across multiple African markets. Their innovative solutions and quick turnaround time made our partnership incredibly successful.
0.name: Michael O.

1.description: The attention to detail and regulatory knowledge in Lan Onasis's compliance technology is exceptional. Their platform has significantly reduced our risk exposure across our operations in Ghana and Kenya.
1.name: Amina K.

2.description: Working with the Lan Onasis team was a game-changer for our digital transformation strategy. Their expertise in financial technology and deep understanding of African markets exceeded our expectations.
2.name: Chike N.

3.description: The quality of Lan Onasis's financial services platform and communication throughout our implementation was outstanding. Their team truly understands the unique challenges of operating in emerging African markets.
3.name: Fatima M.

innovation_award.description: Recognized as "Most Innovative FinTech Solution" at Africa Tech Summit.
innovation_award.title: Innovation Award

vision.description: Lan Onasis isn't just pivotingâ€”we're redefining modern business systems through innovative technology and forward-thinking solutions.

points.0: To build Africa's most intelligent tech ecosystem
points.1: To expand globally with secure, compliant, AI-enhanced platforms
points.2: To empower businesses and regulators to innovate without borders

vision.title: Our Vision
